title: Grimm Douwa: Sakaguchi Naomi Sakuhinshuu
original_name: グリム童話 阪口ナオミ 作品集
sinopse:
1. Akazukin: Gouin na Otoko Hajimete no Yuetsu (Little Red Riding Hood)
2. Kaeru no Ousama: Seijun Soushitsu Shikakerareta Wana (Frog King)
3. Kyoudai Renai: Kobamenai Kimochi (Brother Love)
4. Nightingale no Uta: Shuuchi no Bed Koui (Song of the Nightingale)
